name: Love makes blind
description:
Use FullScreen

Love makes Blind is a short Endless Runner type  game, were you dodge "break_ups" and other bad Things that can hurt your relathionship.

Story:

     -You are on a journey to your girlfriend                                                                                                          -And You have to avoid the enemies that will hurt your relationship

Tipp: You can see enemies if you hover over them with your cursor 

Little Update:ScoreCounter added
